parameterdescription.para: I2C base address

detaileddescription.para: Initialized I2C controller working at master mode

parameterdescription.para: I2C base address
I2C controller source clock source frequency in Hz
status_success if initialization is completed without any error

memberdef.name: i2c_master_address_read

briefdescription.para: I2C master read data from specific address of certain slave device.

detaileddescription.para:
Read fram certain I2C device at specific address within that device
both addr_size_in_byte and size_in_byte should not not greater than I2C_SOC_TRANSFER_COUNT_MAX
ptr
I2C base address
device_address
I2C slave address
addr
address in that I2C device
addr_size_in_byte
I2C address in byte
buf
pointer of the buffer to receive data read from the device
size_in_byte
size of data to be read in bytes
hpm_stat_t
status_success if reading is completed without any error
